mapper.sql: id, `name`, email,password, create_time, edit_time, creator, editor
mapper.update: update user set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
